attributes.action: Stop the price cap increase on energy bills!
attributes.additional_details: The cost of living is rising and putting the squeeze on many individuals and families and simply put the average person or family can’t afford it.
attributes.background: Stop the increase expected in April and the further increase expected in October, we pay enough already for our energy costs.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

The energy cap is set by Ofgem, which is operationally independent of the Government and Parliament.

You might like to sign the following petitions, which call for related actions:

Subsidise energy prices to offset any increase in the energy price cap
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606586

Hold an urgent inquiry into the energy crisis, and remove VAT on fuel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605609

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585

Fund payments to energy customers to cover price rises by taxing oil companies
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608136
